rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious art deco living room with elegant geometric patterns and high ceilings, featuring ample natural light from large north-facing windows. Suitable for entertainment and social gatherings.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A formal dining space with art deco style detailing, complementing the living area. Incorporates a glass accent wall to enhance openness.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxurious master bedroom featuring an en-suite bathroom. Incorporates art deco design with elegant fixtures and Vastu principles ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom designed in art deco style with ample storage and a serene ambiance.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: An additional bedroom for family members or extended use, designed with art deco elements and functional space.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-concept kitchen that complements the art deco style with modern appliances and Vastu compliant layout for optimal energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Kitchen Combined Space
rooms.description: A combined dining and kitchen space designed to facilitate family interaction. The design is streamlined and Vastu aligned.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Separate living space for staff with essential amenities and a small kitchenette. Ensures privacy while being Vastu compliant.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym area designed with art deco elements for a modern workout space, equipped with fitness equipment and soundproofing.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A fully equipped bathroom with modern fixtures and Vastu principles ensuring privacy and proper ventilation.

openings.description: North-facing entrance with art deco detailing and a secure foyer space. Optimizes natural light while adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Large windows in the living room ensuring ample daylight and fresh air from the north, complementing the overall design.
Functional opening connecting the kitchen to an outdoor dining area adjacent to the garden, promoting airflow.
